ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dragon easily defeats Overlord and discovers that The Fiend is in fact Arnold Dimple, the man who shot Debbie Harris. Bonnie Harris manages to separate from The Fiend as a result, and The Devil appears to take her soul. The Devil is confronted and defeated by God, who sends Harris to eternal damnation and Dragon to Earth.
Savage Dragon's in Hell, and he's figured out why! Luckily, he's got somebody in his corner... long beard, nice voice, class act all the way.
ComicInfo.Tags: Jesus Christ,Adolf Hitler,Chicago,Savage Dragon,Abrahamic Deities,Satan,Debbie Harris,Illinois,Nazis,Overlord,Hell,Fiend,God,Bonnie Harris
ComicInfo.Title: God Vs. The Devil
